item.title: Social Media Assistant-LinkedIn - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I am in need of a personal assistant to help me with some simple messaging and commenting tasks for myself and my clients. (Not a sales position)

Training will be provided!

This job will start at around $12-$14 an hour.

Working hours are 8-12 hours a week, Mostly in the morning hours but there will be some wiggle room.

Writing skills are REQUIRED but graphic design and/or video editing skills are a HUGE plus!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$14.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 18:28 UTC
Category: Ghostwriting
Skills:Copywriting, Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Writing, Time Management
Skills: Copywriting, Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Writing, Time Management
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
